name: Within Yourself
description:
This is a scary short horror game inspired by TJoC (The Joy of Creation)

In Within Yourself, you are to complete a total of three stages. You are given clues throughout the game on what to do next to progress. 

This small game was really fun to make, and I hope you all enjoy playing it!

Controls: WASD - movement, F - toggle flashlight, Left Click - Interect, F11 - Fullscreen.

This game will likely not recieve updates, but I plan to make more horror games.

Link to TJoC: https://gamejolt.com/games/tjocsm/139218 you should really try out this game, its really good.
